item.description:
Love Machine at Machine
Valentines Party
saturday february 12th
21+

Dyke Night’s Second Saturdays at Machine will open up early for The Love Machine.

7.30 PM SPEED DATING for SINGLES
No pre-registration needed, just arrive at 7.30 to speed date. Speed dating is a super supportive atmosphere; you’ll have many several minute“mini” dates with multiple singles. We provide the topic of conversation to eliminate the stress. At the end of speed dating, you provide the organizers with who you want us to share your contact info. You have nothing to lose but meeting some new single friends to do things with- and it’s a great cause. 100% of your registration fee goes to the Dyke March.

8-10 PM MINGLE BINGO: All welcome - singles and couples
If you are a supportive friend to a single speed dater, or just want to get in on the action early, at 8 pm we’ll open up the Machine for anyone wanting to enjoy cocktails and conversations. Our Mingle Bingo provides a fun interactive way to network and meet new people along with fun prizes for winners.

Raffle and Auction
auction items are listed at dykenight.com

10 pm -2 am DJ Kris Kono
DJ Kris Kono hits the decks at for the largest lesbian dance party in New England. Capture your memory at the photo booth-enjoy the eye candy of the Love Machine dancers and their all queer staff, with only $1 coat check.

SHARING THE LOVE
This event is a fundraiser for the Boston Dyke March. $20 includes speed dating, bingo and dance party (7.30 open- 2 am). $10 after 10 pm for dance party only.

For more info, go to dykenight.com
item.why: This event is a fundraiser for the Boston Dyke March.

group.who: Friends of the Boston Dyke March
group.name: The Boston Dyke March

item.name: Dyke Night's Love Machine: A Fundraiser for the Boston Dyke March
